mutants.original_line: if len(vertices) != 4:
mutants.mutated_line: if len(vertices) == 4:
mutants.code:
def is_rectangle(segments):
    vertices = set()
    for segment in segments:
        (x1, y1, x2, y2) = segment
        if not (x1 == x2 or y1 == y2):
            return False
        vertices.add((x1, y1))
        vertices.add((x2, y2))
    if len(vertices) == 4:
        return False
    x_coords = set()
    y_coords = set()
    for (x, y) in vertices:
        x_coords.add(x)
        y_coords.add(y)
    if len(x_coords) != 2 or len(y_coords) != 2:
        return False
    top = bottom = right = left = False
    for segment in segments:
        (x1, y1, x2, y2) = segment
        top = top or (y1 == y2 and x1 != x2 and (y1 == max(y_coords)))
        bottom = bottom or (y1 == y2 and x1 != x2 and (y1 == min(y_coords)))
        right = right or (x1 == x2 and y1 != y2 and (x1 == max(x_coords)))
        left = left or (x1 == x2 and y1 != y2 and (x1 == min(x_coords)))
    return top and bottom and right and left

mutants.original_line: if len(x_coords) != 2 or len(y_coords) != 2:
mutants.mutated_line: if len(x_coords) != 2 and len(y_coords) != 2:
